item.title: Bretty Saison
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
This supremely funky saison has a strong Brett nose, with some breadiness and notes of pie cherries and grapefruit. It pours copper in color, somewhat hazy, with an off-white head.
It's the taste, though, that makes this a beer you'll want to keep a secret: it's crisp, with notes of fresh-cut grass and bread, slightly tart, slightly citrusy. Each sip makes you want another.

item.title: Winter Is Coming
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded: This oaked imperial brown ale was brewed with generous amounts of cherries, giving it a supremely fruity character. It's strong malt backbone balances perfectly with its citrusy hops, and the bourbon barrel aging process smooths out all the rough edges, leaving behind a roasty, brown sugar, cherry pie flavor that'll keep you warm for the winter.

item.title: Mocha Russian Stout
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded: Weighing in at over 11% alcohol, this is a beer to keep you warm for the winter. With notes of chocolate, cinnamon, nutmeg, chile pepper, and above all coffee, the Mocha Russian Stout is one of our favorite seasonal brews.
item.excerpt:encoded: Weighing in at over 11% alcohol, with notes of chocolate & coffee, this is a beer to keep you warm for the winter.

item.title: Big Blonde
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded: Inspired by the Trappist brewing tradition, this Beligan-style blonde ale is no slouch. Its fluffy white head invites you to take a sip. When you do, you're greeted by a sweet, effervescent, slightly spicy ale with notes of orange, cloves, and a hint of banana.

item.title: Hyperion IPA
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded: Our first bourbon barrel oaked IPA, Hyperion is a massive, aggressively hopped, West Coast-style brew. Supremely piney, both in nose and taste, its rich, malty sweetness is the perfect complement to its crisp bitterness.

item.title: Krampus' Christmas Ale
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
Children in German-speaking countries believe that an evil imp named Krampus follows Saint Nicholas, and rather than receiving coal, the naughty children get swept up into Krampus' bag and carried off.
This winter ale encompasses everything we love---both naughty and nice---about the Christmas season. Cloves, oranges, and pine give this ale all the flavors of the season.
item.excerpt:encoded: This winter ale encompasses everything we love—both naughty and nice—about the Christmas season. Cloves, oranges, and pine give this ale all the flavors of the season.

item.title: Jane Doe
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net

item.title: John Appleseed
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded: John Appleseed is a fictitious staff member with Forever Young. If he were real, we'd write a real bio here. It would include lots of interesting information about Mr. Appleseed, preferably things that our fans would actually be interested in. What kind of beers does he love? What's his history with the brewing scene? What, in particular, has he contributed to the beers people love?

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
[bg highlight]By beer lovers, for beer lovers.[/bg]

[bg mb=10]From effervescent, Belgian-style saisons to the most massive, monstrous stouts...[/bg] [bg mb=10]From cutting-edge, label-defying experimental brews to ancient recipe revivals...[/bg] [bg mb=10]Forever Young stands for loving beer & beer culture to the fullest.[/bg]    

[bg highlight]Our Beers[/bg]

[beers columns=6 length=0 /]    

[bg highlight]Our Story[/bg]

[container] Here at Forever Young, we're brewers and culinarians. Our mission is simple: to produce fresh, flavorful beers using the finest local ingredients and the best of both old & new brewing techniques. We want our beer to taste good, but we also want it to taste good with food. We don’t want to blow-out your palate, we want you to explore the hidden flavors and understand the complexities of the taste. We're a crazy, kooky bunch, but we work hard & get the job done. At work, we try to keep our day-to-day activities light & fun. Above all, we’re adventurous. We started as homebrewers, and we've never lost that sense of exploration. We hope you'll join us on our beer adventure. [/container]    

[bg highlight]Visit Our Taproom[/bg]

[widgets_on_pages]
View Our Tour Schedule

item.title: Tyler Young
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded: Tyler is the founder and head brewer of Forever Young. Tyler was introduced to homebrewing shortly after college, and has been brewing prolifically ever since. His day job at BrewSites allows him to combine his love of craft beer with his talents as a Web designer. He finds the most gratifying part of his job to be working with breweries whose beers he loves to drink.

item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
Our staff is the best in the world!
Check them out below!

item.title: Tour the Brewery
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
In the neighborhood? Drop by for a free tour of our production facility. Each tour lasts about 1 hour, during which one of our master brewers will tell you about our history, our brewing process, and our approach to beer & business. Each tour concludes in our tasting room, where (if you're over 21!) you'll enjoy a guided tasting of a variety of our beers.

Details

All tours are available on a first-come, first-serve basis. Most tours fill up about a half hour in advance, so to guarantee your spot on the tour, we suggest arriving at least an hour early. Because we are an active production facility, and because stuff happens, our tour schedule is subject to change without notice.

Tour Times

item.title: Visit the Taproom
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
Our taproom---located right next door to our production brewery---is open to the public. Stop by to sample each of our production beers, plus a few small-batch, one-off creations. It's always a joy to see what our brewers have dreamed up this week! Although our tours start and finish in the taproom, you certainly don't have to take a tour to come hang out with us! Don't forget your ID!

Beer Flights

For $5, you can score four 4-oz. samples! This is a great way to try everything we have on tap without breaking the bank (or the blood alcohol limit!).

Taproom Hours

  • Monday--Friday: 3 pm to 7 pm
  • Saturday--Sunday: 11 am to 7 pm

item.content:encoded: We've just added our first products in the shop... check them out!

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Forever Young Hoodie
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample product. Enjoy the comfort of this warm and toasty pullover hoodie. You’re going to love it. We’ve made it from a 10oz. cotton-poly blend with a 100% cotton face. It has set-in sleeves and double needle-stitched armholes and bottom band for durability.

Size & Fit

  • Model is 6’2” and wearing a large
  • Standard fit
  • Runs true to size

Fabric & Care

  • 10 oz. cotton-poly blend with a 100% cotton face
  • Roomy front pouch pocket and hood.
  • Imported
  • Machine wash cold. Tumble dry Low.
item.excerpt:encoded: A short description of the product goes here. The goal is to entice the visitor to keep reading, maybe click the reviews, etc.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I loved this sweatshirt! It fit perfectly, and looks great.

item.excerpt:encoded: A simple tulip glass---ideal for Belgian beers.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I liked it, but then I dropped it and it shattered. Darn.

item.title: Forever Young Insulated Growler Bag
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
This innovative beer tote makes it easier than ever to take your growler on the go! No matter where you're headed, your beer will stay colder and fresher longer when it's transported in this insulated growler bag. The smart design and astounding functionality are the real benefits here, the attractive and stylish KegWorks logo is just an added bonus. In stock and ready to ship.

Features

The single top-loading compartment is designed to accommodate your 64oz growler perfectly. Padded with rigid foam for insulation and shape. Zippered top for easy access. Durable hand strap for easy carrying. Comfortable, adjustable and removable shoulder strap.
item.excerpt:encoded:
• The single top-loading compartment is designed to accommodate your growler perfectly.
  • Padded with rigid foam for effective insulation.
  • Zippered top for easy access.
  • Use the durable hand strap or adjustable, removable shoulder strap for comfortable carrying.

item.title: Forever Young Growler
item.dc:creator: tyler@conversioninsights.net
item.content:encoded:
Tired of your boring old glass beer growler? Well, the future called and suggested you upgrade to the convenience, elegance, and sheer awesomeness of this 64-ounce food grade stainless steel growler. Featuring an attached swing top to keep your beer fresh and a whistle-clean passivated interior that won't impart any undue flavors, this space-age growler is blazing a new trail in the beer-drinking wilderness. The acid-etched KegWorks logo on its side is the finishing touch that truly makes this a drinking vessel to be reckoned with. Leave the aggravation of lost caps and worries about delicate glass to the inglorious past. Answer the call of the future and get this SS Growler in your hands today!

Care Instructions

  • Hand wash only with warm water and mild soap (no bleach or abrasive cleaners)
  • Use only non-metallic bottle brush or bottle sponge
  • Let dry thoroughly between each use and store with lid open
  • Do not microwave or freeze
  • Not designed for hot liquids, nonfood, or caustic, highly acidic materials
  • Not guaranteed against leakage from above average tap pressure
  • Use for conditioning or fermenting at own risk
  • Keep silicone seal away from children.

Features

Made of food grade 18/8 stainless steel with no plastic liner. Replaceable and cleanable food grade silicone seal. Acid etched KegWorks logo. Passivated to ensure tap fresh flavor. Unique swing top keeps beer fresh. Elegant design for easy grip. Conveniently carry your beer, water, or any other cold beverage.
item.excerpt:encoded:
• Made of food grade 18/8 stainless steel with no plastic liner.
  • Replaceable and cleanable food grade silicone seal.
  • Acid etched KegWorks logo.
  • Passivated to ensure tap fresh flavor.
